text: "Until the Day I Die" is the debut single by American rock band Story of the Year. It is the second track on their debut studio album, Page Avenue (2003). "Until the Day I Die" was released to radio on August 12, 2003. ==Personnel== * Dan Marsala – lead vocals * Ryan Phillips – lead guitar * Adam Russell – bass * Josh Wills – drums * Philip Sneed – rhythm guitar (music video) * Greg Haupt - rhythm guitar (recording) ==References== Category:Debut singles Category:2003 songs Category:Story of the Year songs
title: Until the Day I Die
